name: PILES
description: This unique formula is designed to address piles by shrinking the mass and healing fissures. It also provides calcium to thicken the blood and prevents anorectal itching, burning, and infections. Available in both capsules and syrup, it targets various types of piles including Vataja, Pittaja, Kaphaja, Rakta, and Congenital.

name: STONE RID
description: Stone Rid is an Ayurvedic formula focused on kidney health, acting as a stone crusher and alkalizer. It inhibits calculogenesis, ensures disintegration of calculi, and reduces painful symptoms of burning micturition. It effectively cleanses the urinary bladder of sediment and stones, offering anti-spasmodic and anti-inflammatory relief for ureteric colic. Ideal for kidney stone tendency and various urinary tract issues.

name: ANTI URIC ACID
description: Anti Uric Acid is an Ayurvedic solution designed to lower uric acid levels and treat gout attacks. This formula effectively cures pain and swelling in various organs including the intestine, liver, uterus, and urinary tract. It's also beneficial in reducing joint and muscle inflammation. Its herbs exhibit antilithiatic activity, preventing kidney stone formation, and provide strong anti-arthritis, anti-gout, and anti-inflammatory actions. Suitable for primary and secondary gout, uric acid stones, oxidative damage, and cardiovascular health.

name: ANTACID

This syrup targets symptoms like stomach acid, constipation, swelling in the abdomen, sour stomach, and peptic ulcer pain, ensuring a feeling of lightness and comfort after meals.

It is a trusted choice for various liver conditions including jaundice, enlargement of the liver, viral hepatitis B, chronic hepatitis, cirrhosis, and alcoholic liver.
